text: Dambulla Sixers (formerly Dambulla Aura, Dambulla Giants, Dambulla Viiking, and Dambulla Thunders) is a professional franchise cricket team that plays in the Lanka Premier League (LPL). They were formed in 2020, and represent Sri Lanka's Western Province. The team play their home matches at the Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium in the city of Dambulla. ==References== Category:Lanka Premier League teams Category:2020 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Dambulla Sixers
